column3: “I think this is one of my favorite mid grade" indica strains.  No it isn't purple or fruit flavored
column5: it smells down right piney.  2 TINY meant to be one hitter bowls (tiny temp plastic bong) were more than happy to MELT pain i didn't realize i had until my back cracked in 10 places......but dont be fooled.  Altho my buzz started off talkative enough about 30 mins in....couch lock.  Don't get me wrong

column3: “I made the newb mistake of confusing this strain with Afghooey, which is a hybrid rather than a straight indica. I tried Afgooey first and wasn't paying close attention the second time I acquired it and was about to be disappointed at the inconsistency!  I thought Afgooey had let me down for pain relief! But it turned out that what I chose wasn't Afgooey but the often-confused Afghooey!  The hybrid isn't as good for ...”

“Excellent for any type of pain and stress. Pain and stress goes away with the first hit. Stays gone for at least 4 hours. If you have insomnia, take one hit and you won't have it anymore. Great nighttime strain. If you stay home sick from pain, get some Afgooey, stretch out on the couch and watch your favorite movie!! You'll love your day!”
“would give 11 rating lol. very good sticky weed. alotta peoples favorite. easy to get confused with afghooey, which is also very good. highly recommended.”
“so smooth,  nice clean clear high but relaxing and low key”
“Delicious spicy-fruity bud. I got mine as Afghan goo"...i think this is the same thing. It's label said 70/30 sativa/indica hybrid
column4: and it feels like it! Great sativa upswing with am enjoyable
column5: non-overbearing sativa "chill". I'd get it again!”"

column3: “good shit”

“I have tried this variety and so far enjoyed it.  The flowers are dense, dark with orange hairs and very sticky. It has a sharp scent that to me is of citrus with a hint of skunk.  Smoking it was pleasant and I found it gentle on my lungs.  It does produce very milky smoke and it kept a fruity taste finishing with a hint of pepper.  

Effects took a few moments to become therapeutic.   It resulted in relaxation and m...”
“Just grabbed top shelf Afgooey at 24.98% THC. And you can feel every percent of that THC very relaxing and packs a punch. The bomb smell WILL hit u in your ass on the way out 5/5”

“I found this strain to be a nice surprise for my evening after a long days work.  Sitting back, relaxing and able to function and was in a creative state to where I began to write a couple of poems for my journal.  Highly recommend.  Also was able to function during the day, when I reduced my dosage to be able to function at work.  Pick up at Yavapai Herbal in Cottonwood, My favorite place.”
“Afgooey makes me emotionally relaxed.”
“I would use this strain whenever I feel restless. And as soon as I use it instantly my mood changes and I feel relaxed and have a good night sleep. Love this strain.”

“• there aren't many pure indicas that I will smoke or vape all day... except for (Advanced Grow Labs') *Afghooey* — a pure cannibis vaping oil that clocks-in at a whopping 81% thc, while I've never seen such an impressively complex terpenes-profile (w/such high levels OF said-terps!) • 👌🏻 
• Sweet, delicious, intense flavor & 007-smooth, welcome + delightful inhalation of blessed-euphoria immediately blankets my bo...”
“If weed highs were measured like earthquakes, this stuff is bringing the city down.”

“Writing as I burn; using an Illadelph beaker.  This is one of the finest flowers I have had the pleasure of smoking.  I am an every day user and the high from this is strong, which I haven't felt from a flower in a long time, but very enjoyable for that very reason.”

“Picked up an 1/8 of Afgooey from Foothill Wellness Center. Great, super friendly staff. Good buds. Nice flowery smell on  inhale, piney lemony on exhale. Not really great tasting smoke. Great high for me though. Relaxing,little face melting,but definitely feel the Sativa in it. Giggly,talkative, (i can be painfully shy...and I have been using MMJ for a little over a year.This is my first review...so yeah really helps...”

“Writing as I burn; using an Illadelph beaker.  This is one of the finest flowers I have had the pleasure of smoking.  I am an every day user and the high from this is strong, which I haven't felt from a flower in a long time, but very enjoyable for that very reason.”

“Picked up an 1/8 of Afgooey from Foothill Wellness Center. Great, super friendly staff. Good buds. Nice flowery smell on  inhale, piney lemony on exhale. Not really great tasting smoke. Great high for me though. Relaxing,little face melting,but definitely feel the Sativa in it. Giggly,talkative, (i can be painfully shy...and I have been using MMJ for a little over a year.This is my first review...so yeah really helps...”

“A great night time medicine.  

The heavy body feeling of indica is extremely strong in this strain.  

The effects come on gradually and not instantly, but it isn't what I would call creeper because you do feel the effects right way.  They just intensify over time.

Effects last 2-3 hours depending on dosage.”

“I got this in concentrate form and man it knocks me out err time, like I'm scared to do this stuff in the day time, it's too potent. I will say tho the flavor is just alright it's pretty alright nothing amazing tho. Defiantly worth a try if you can get it”

“Like Shotgun BANG ! Wow very fast, acts on almost every level for your mid eve relax or pre- bed smoke. This was very hashy tasting, and after first bowl just plain stoned. Indica at its classical- meets metallica stage.. Love it”
“Good for nightime use but don't use it during the day unless you want to sit around on the couch. It's a very heavy" high; moderately good pain relief.”"
“This is now one of my favorite top 5 choices.  Pleasurable scent. Great feeling high, both mental and body.”
“Great strain before bedtime, the laughing stage lasts from 30 minutes to an hour and then you are ready to sleep. I get a lot of giggles first.”

“I got this in concentrate form and man it knocks me out err time, like I'm scared to do this stuff in the day time, it's too potent. I will say tho the flavor is just alright it's pretty alright nothing amazing tho. Defiantly worth a try if you can get it”

“Like Shotgun BANG ! Wow very fast, acts on almost every level for your mid eve relax or pre- bed smoke. This was very hashy tasting, and after first bowl just plain stoned. Indica at its classical- meets metallica stage.. Love it”

“A+ but let me warn you, when I had mine I wasn't ready. I mean I was but I wasn't. Afgooey is one of the chillest strains I've ever had. I've had plenty of good indicas but I'd rate this one as one best.”
“This is now one of my favorite top 5 choices.  Pleasurable scent. Great feeling high, both mental and body.”
“Great Afghan taste and space high”
“great stuff for cancer patients”

“This strain I only grew 2 plants of but its a very good strain fluffy light colored buds because of the trichomes but enough buzz makes this perfect for night time or a relaxing daytime when you just need to chill and a perfect Balance strain...”

“I knew a guy who lived in So. Cal. 3 months out of the year just for Prop 215 and this strain, Afghooey, Afgoo whatever you wanna call it. It is sticky as fuck, can stick it to a pane of glass. It has really tight buds, the first time I got it there were some colas but this time it was mostly the bottom-of-the-pound shake. This strain has so much THC it just falls off, I use a razor blade to cut up my bowls so I don'...”
“wow is all i can say. 2 hits and i had a damn good buzz. long lasting as well. took away my pain and nausea too.”
“all-round good strain, good high, nice yield. Be careful when flowering cuz this strain can more then double in size the first 3 weeks of flowering.”
“Great Afghan taste and space high”
“Usually prefer sativa hybrids, but love this Indica. Excellent mood lifter, decent for pain, promotes a happy, connected, well-being sensation. Lowers anxiety. Some dry mouth, but not too bad.”

“This strain knocked me on my a**! Nice buzz, mostly a 'head' high and very relaxing. Get the munchies ready if you try this strain.  
Overall score 1- 10 I'd give it an 8.”
“Very potent strain. A little couch-lock, but good happy indica high. Definitely would recommend for relaxation.”

“I knew a guy who lived in So. Cal. 3 months out of the year just for Prop 215 and this strain, Afghooey, Afgoo whatever you wanna call it. It is sticky as fuck, can stick it to a pane of glass. It has really tight buds, the first time I got it there were some colas but this time it was mostly the bottom-of-the-pound shake. This strain has so much THC it just falls off, I use a razor blade to cut up my bowls so I don'...”

“Afgooey delivers deep, muscle-melting relaxation, together with a giddy, giggly, low-stress euphoric high. A wonderful mixture of uplifting (but not energetic) and mellow (but not couch-locked) properties. This one is probably my #1 personal favorite.”

“Afgooey delivers deep, muscle-melting relaxation, together with a giddy, giggly, low-stress euphoric high. A wonderful mixture of uplifting (but not energetic) and mellow (but not couch-locked) properties. This one is probably my #1 personal favorite.”

“Got some of this Afghooey just before break and I have been ripped off my ass since. It makes me so much more creative, I've already filled up two sketchbooks and and a notebook with sketches and concepts. I also smoked it with a couple of friends this afternoon when we broke from class to get lunch, namely because one of the guys has tourettes and wanted to see if it would help, he said that it was pretty good, not ...”
“Great Afghan taste and space high”

“smoking this strain as I write this, gives me a pulsing, strong body high though not crazy lazy. It almost brings across a strong euphoric/relaxing sense of calm and peace which trails into a dreamy state, great for video games, movies, jerking off, whatever”
“we are at a bonfire and im highhhhhhhhh good job Afghanistan!”

“The strain has classic indica effects. Strong pain relieving qualities as the warm rush travels through the body.  your eyes get heavy and you become slow with relaxation. the taste and smell is woody, but I got a berry spike on the exhale, which was pleasantly surprising.  a great strain for smokers that appreciate indicas.”
“Rec store running special on this, got it pretty cheap. Exactly what I was looking for, something that would pin me to the couch. Made me hungry and sleepy.”

“This is a nice Indica that comes in quick-like,  even when vaped, with a solid body stone and good hyper-focus. A sweet little evening bud for creative downtime, stargazing, or a warm bath. Would also be excellent in PM edibles! Relieved muscle tension in my neck and back, and I’m working holiday retail, so that says something. 

I’m not going to lie, the taste is earthy, but it’s not bad- I like it, there’s pine her...”

“This is a nice Indica that comes in quick-like,  even when vaped, with a solid body stone and good hyper-focus. A sweet little evening bud for creative downtime, stargazing, or a warm bath. Would also be excellent in PM edibles! Relieved muscle tension in my neck and back, and I’m working holiday retail, so that says something. 

I’m not going to lie, the taste is earthy, but it’s not bad- I like it, there’s pine her...”
“Great Afghan taste and space high”

“Very good yield in scrog. It is growing fat, rock-hard buds covered in resin.  When smoked , it made me talkative, hungry and very relaxed. Be warned....it's not recomanded as a daytime smoke for it will leave you couchlocked and sleepy . It also can make dizzy and confused if you smoke too much.”
“Just got my hands on this strain last week. It has a very potent strong piney citrus smell. This strain just makes me feel good all around. Great for a morning buzz and I highly recommend it.”

“The strain has classic indica effects. Strong pain relieving qualities as the warm rush travels through the body.  your eyes get heavy and you become slow with relaxation. the taste and smell is woody, but I got a berry spike on the exhale, which was pleasantly surprising.  a great strain for smokers that appreciate indicas.”

“I have to review this strain because it's the closest thing to Bart Simpson OG - which is what I'm smoking now but Leafly doesn't have BSO listed.  

Anyway, holy fuck this is a heavy hitter!  It's 23.8% THC and the sugar is thick.  This gets me mentally pumped like a fire Sativa but glues me down like a heavy Indica.  I'm watching The Fog and its been a badass Halloween.  Just give this strain a try: either Afgooey ...”
“Rec store running special on this, got it pretty cheap. Exactly what I was looking for, something that would pin me to the couch. Made me hungry and sleepy.”

“A bit too overwhelming for me. I picked up an 8th of this from a dispensary in Humboldt and it was seriously some of the strongest Indica based Cannabis I've ever had. It put me out like a light. Even if I had a small bowl I would be very tired... I appreciate this effect as I do have trouble sleeping at night, but I only had this strain at the time and it made smoking and enjoying the day time almost impossible.”
“Awesome for nausea and tummy problems!”

“I have to review this strain because it's the closest thing to Bart Simpson OG - which is what I'm smoking now but Leafly doesn't have BSO listed.  

Anyway, holy fuck this is a heavy hitter!  It's 23.8% THC and the sugar is thick.  This gets me mentally pumped like a fire Sativa but glues me down like a heavy Indica.  I'm watching The Fog and its been a badass Halloween.  Just give this strain a try: either Afgooey ...”
“SO pleasantly tasty and smooth.. Usually prefer sativas, but couldn't pass up trying this one, and I'm glad I did! Nicely mellow, happy, euphoria-galore!”

“A bit too overwhelming for me. I picked up an 8th of this from a dispensary in Humboldt and it was seriously some of the strongest Indica based Cannabis I've ever had. It put me out like a light. Even if I had a small bowl I would be very tired... I appreciate this effect as I do have trouble sleeping at night, but I only had this strain at the time and it made smoking and enjoying the day time almost impossible.”
“Pretty organic tasting buds.... very nice lazy yet space-y high... Nice Smoke.”

“Not my favorite, but not my least favorite, either. It works well for a lot of my issues, but not as much for anxiety and stress as I'd hoped. Also didn't help me sleep, either. I NEED SLEEP!

Tastes good, smells okay...not too harsh.”
“First weed ive ever smoked. i love this shit”
“Love love love this indica, altho my norm are sativas and hybrids. Definitely 5-star worthy, without question!”
“Love love love this indica, altho my norm are sativas and hybrids. Definitely 5-star worthy, without question!”
“I came across a strain simply AF-crack"
column4: obviously is afgoo x green crack. This one really surprised me
column5: I was given a nice amount and at first was gonna say thank you then when my buddy left toss it. Well I'm glad I didn't! The person i got this from id view as "master grower"(25 years of grows and I don't consider myself a master) so I took another look. The buds were super super dense and frosted almost like a p...”"

column3: “Some super dank weed damn this shit was potent when I smoked it.”

“the flower it self was great! very nice to smell, creamy smoke , rich earthly flavor. I was very pleased. however it made my anxiety way worse which was a huge let down. (for me) if you don't have any nervous disorder or anxiety /PTSD .. ect. this is a great strain to start your morning”
“SO pleasantly tasty and smooth.. Usually prefer sativas, but couldn't pass up trying this one, and I'm glad I did! Nicely mellow, happy, euphoria-galore!”
“Rec store running special on this, got it pretty cheap. Exactly what I was looking for, something that would pin me to the couch. Made me hungry and sleepy.”

I’m not going to lie, the taste is earthy, but it’s not bad- I like it, there’s pine her...”
“Great Strain very high strength. If it wasn't for the paranoia, I'd had rated it a 9.”

column3: “The strain of Afghooey I have is extremely potent. A small bowl smoked out of a glass spoon it gives me a nice slightly upbeat high but with defined body effects, but a small bowl out of a a double perc bong was way too intense for me. It gave me a good amount of paranoia and my anxiety levels were through the roof for a good 2 hours. Be careful with this if you have anxiety issues.”
“Some super dank weed damn this shit was potent when I smoked it.”
“SO pleasantly tasty and smooth.. Usually prefer sativas, but couldn't pass up trying this one, and I'm glad I did! Nicely mellow, happy, euphoria-galore!”
“Awesome for nausea and tummy problems!”
“I feel a void within my stomach that feels as though it is going to burst but all that happens is a lingering sense of starvation. mentally draining and physically crippling. 9/10.”

“The strain of Afghooey I have is extremely potent. A small bowl smoked out of a glass spoon it gives me a nice slightly upbeat high but with defined body effects, but a small bowl out of a a double perc bong was way too intense for me. It gave me a good amount of paranoia and my anxiety levels were through the roof for a good 2 hours. Be careful with this if you have anxiety issues.”

“Not my favorite, but not my least favorite, either. It works well for a lot of my issues, but not as much for anxiety and stress as I'd hoped. Also didn't help me sleep, either. I NEED SLEEP!

Tastes good, smells okay...not too harsh.”
“Some super dank weed damn this shit was potent when I smoked it.”

I’m not going to lie, the taste is earthy, but it’s not bad- I like it, there’s pine her...”
“Awesome body high, pefect for bed time”
“SO pleasantly tasty and smooth.. Usually prefer sativas, but couldn't pass up trying this one, and I'm glad I did! Nicely mellow, happy, euphoria-galore!”
“A favorite of mine. Lasts a long time and hits hard. Smells a little fruity almost and tastes delicious.”
“First weed ive ever smoked. i love this shit”
“Some super dank weed damn this shit was potent when I smoked it.”
“Awesome body high, pefect for bed time”

I’m not going to lie, the taste is earthy, but it’s not bad- I like it, there’s pine her...”
“Rec store running special on this, got it pretty cheap. Exactly what I was looking for, something that would pin me to the couch. Made me hungry and sleepy.”

“I love this strain! When I smoked this Afgooey It didn't hit me until half way through the blunt (mind you, I was sharing with my wife as well) and when it did I was on the moon! It relaxed my muscles and made them feel lose and put me in a good mood. This is one of those strains where if you were to get a massage it would feel 10× better just being high on this strain rather than not being high at all, Also this is ...”
“Awesome body high, pefect for bed time”

“My first OpenVape cartridge was Afgooey, and I was pretty happy with it. Nice body buzz with a clear head makes it good for all day treatment for me. 

Consumption method: CO2 Oil - OpenVape.”

“Very good yield in scrog. It is growing fat, rock-hard buds covered in resin.  When smoked , it made me talkative, hungry and very relaxed. Be warned....it's not recomanded as a daytime smoke for it will leave you couchlocked and sleepy . It also can make dizzy and confused if you smoke too much.”

column3: “Good Indica for those who have specific medical needs for sleeplessness, anxiety,sadness.  Not a lot of phycho effect to keep your mind awake.  Herbalist Farmer is my favorite source for this.”
“I couldn't stop smiling. Love it”
“Helps me sleep, can't go wrong there”
“The texture of this bud is phenomenal! The batch I had was gooey as play-dough and smoked well!”
“Spacey but focused high. Very relaxing but not to the point where you don't want to move. Very smooth inhale.”
“My wife's new personal favorite.  I like it too, but It needs a little more flavor to beat my favorites.  Light earthy flavor via vaping.   This Indica is very sedative and helps with sleeping.”

“totally chilled me out after a long day of trimming, relaxed euphoria and sent me to bed, was a pleasant  body high followed  by  an intensely comfortable  body high and then bed... ill update my thoughts on it after a couple more times :) so far one of my favorites. .. keep up the great work Okanogan County! !!”
“Good for a chill show like 4/3/98”
“relax”
“very stickey, beautiful trichomes very floral smoke”
“Great stain for sleep. Has a nice flavor. Lots of crystals. Excellent weed indeed.”
“Nice color, stinky, sticky, smokes long, effects last, and tastes great!”
“Good for a chill show like 4/3/98”
“very stickey, beautiful trichomes very floral smoke”

“Tasty, relaxing, light - not heavy - headed, even bodied, steady high.
Very enjoyable. Smoked in morning but totally agree I could sleep like a baby if I didn't have to make pumpkin pie for Thanksgiving. 
No real munchies. Didn't zap my energy.  
Great for just chilling out I'd say.”
“Pure Indica Vibe strongly comparable to Willys Wonder...very Sweet..Strongly Recommend for Nighttime only or on your Days Off”
“Nice color, stinky, sticky, smokes long, effects last, and tastes great!”

“good strain, taste of 🌎&🌲
smooth, very high strain
dense lime green buds, covered in crystals
good choice of strain, i recomend trying this strain if u get the chane!✌💯🔥🌲”
“couldn't keep my eyes open”

“Indica fans this is a MUST. Please believe that this strain kills pain and assists with sleep and anxiety. This is a rare strain and if you can get proper 22%+ then you should have the relief that Afgooey is famous for. I really enjoy it when it comes around it's a must try/stock for ailments.”
“Helps me sleep, can't go wrong there”

“I really like Afgooey.  My caregiver knows that I'm big on taste, if I can't tolerate it, I won't medicate with it.  For me there's nothing worse than a harsh hitting med when I'm already in pain.  I would recommend this to people like me who prefer smooth hitting meds that do the job right!  The overall smell, taste and effect is well worth trying if you haven't already.”
“Very intense couchlock at onset, after which it leveled out at about 20,000 feet. I'm just not sure whether that's above or below sea level.”

“Afghooey is a great strain for when you want to relax, and take your mind off of every day stress. Afghooey is also good for relieving depression and helps slightly with insomnia.

I recommend this strain for mainly stress and insomnia.”

“Too strong for me.  Crept up too fast and immediately couch-locked me.  I felt dizzy unless I was completely horizontal.  Really bad dry mouth. 
Maybe I just took too much. 
At one point I was paralyzed and could hardly hear. Totally impossible to communicate with the outside world.
Probly won't try again.”
“very stickey, beautiful trichomes very floral smoke”
“Spacey but focused high. Very relaxing but not to the point where you don't want to move. Very smooth inhale.”
“I couldn't stop smiling. Love it”
“some pretty good tree like the strength only took 2 bowls to toke and i was koo for like 2 periods of class :)”
“Awesome afghan phenotype. Long buds with Velcro like trics you can hear the buds tearing apart! Really good stone the afghan and kush genetics are reliably super stony;)”
“powerful”
“a heavy drizzle-like buzz!  Ripe and earthy.”

“maui haze x afghani #1 cross very powerful combination that leaves you pretty messed up. I don't particularly like this combination which is a little too heavy in the indica department which is not my favorite type of high. I much prefer sativa. Would be good for medicinal use I imagine.”
“Very distinct smell and taste. One of my personal favorites.”
“Im not a huge fan of this strain because it usually just makes me feel really tired.”
“I love this strain. I have never felt so silly and goofy until I've had afghooey. Love it!”
“Great bag appeal, an average hybrid that leans a little toward the sativa. Well balanced herb, noob friendly.”
“this weed beat my body into submission and robbed my mind of logic.”

“This medication tends to be more of a relaxing high for me. When I open my jar, I am met with a pungent aroma. The first pull from the unlit joint provides sweet berry like flavors. After a slow smooth inhale you are once again presented with the berry flavor on the exhale.  The medication comes on gently allowing you to enjoy the onset of relief.  Once everything is in full effect just kick back and soak up the mome...”
“Slow build and pleasant. Not an overpowering aroma. Smooth. Good for when clear thinking is required. Decent pain relief. Warm and fuzzy feeling all over.”
“couldn't keep my eyes open”
“relax”

“totally chilled me out after a long day of trimming, relaxed euphoria and sent me to bed, was a pleasant  body high followed  by  an intensely comfortable  body high and then bed... ill update my thoughts on it after a couple more times :) so far one of my favorites. .. keep up the great work Okanogan County! !!”
“The texture of this bud is phenomenal! The batch I had was gooey as play-dough and smoked well!”
“I use this for sleep. Two hits and it is morning! It does vary due to moods etc.”
“Wowww this strain is amazing fruity, zesty, smooth, taste and the high is just unbelievable.!!!!!”

“An excellent strain, after a minute of vaporizing you take off. Great body high and head high combination. Potent stuff, the strongest strain I've vaped in a while. Left me hallucinating and seeing stars with slight panic for a minute, but nothing major. Caused me to space out more than once and sometimes couldn't keep myself from laughing. Ensures for a good night's sleep, though not a go-to for insomnia for me, whi...”
“This is some cool shit right here!”
“Just wow.   This is my sleepy time medicine”

“I’m not a fan of Woody scents and flavors, but the quality of the high this strain gives doesn’t disappoint. Although the smell and taste are mild and woody, Afgooey gave me a slow climbing heavy high in both mind and body but mainly body. Great bedtime bud. Very sticky buds similar to gorilla glue, hence its nick name “Sticky OG”

For smokers who like a mild yet satisfying high to cap the night off and provide a goo...”

“Afgooey has been around for sometime now and I have enjoyed this time throughly. A very strong smoke that can easily take your breath away when smoked through a bong in flower form. Much like that of dabbing oils. Not recommended for newbie smokers. A very strong hybrid that has a sour hashy flavor with hints of menthol and grape. One of the few strains that is both sticky and oily. Day or night, enjoy this strain wi...”

“Huge Bushy Plant with lots of dense gooey buds that cure out very nice. A smooth smoke with a piney disel aroma. Doesn't couch lock me, but my tolerance is pretty high. Better for later in the day. Good for anxiety, depression and pain relief.”
“good”

“I’m a new marijuana user and while I’d recommend this strain for a seasoned expert, I would advise noobs to stay away for awhile! After 3 hits from my pipe I was nauseated and my chest tightened painfully. At first, I thought my body was rejecting it and just as I said “This was a bad idea,” the fun part kicked in. Jello Legs, slackjaw, heavy eyelids, and lots of laughs. Followed by a bizarre paranoia and memory laps...”

“...Alien.like 

stress & depression ...gone, 
leaves somewhat of a  slo-mo effect for a good while

first toke left me  paranoid &  seemed to fu**  my soc. skills .all the way up. so dont make plans first go round & youll b fine

bag and nose appeal falls short but-

an all around great strain for awkward folk like myslf

Alien.....Out”
“Top 5”
“like a skunk-flavored candy bar.  *note that I've never smelt a skunk other than scratch 'n sniff*”
“ohhweee”
“It thrive outdoor in northern climate too. Very nice for the taste and effect.”

“Afgooey is a hybrid cross between Afghan and Maui Haze.Its covered in THC and has a orange,citrus, grapefruit like smell.It is very potent and good for sleeping.Overall very good strain,one of my favorites”
“Great spacey relaxing buzz”
“this has always been one of my all time favorite strains. I like devastating hits and this one never disappoints. heavy high good choaky weed.”
“Great taste, perfect buzz to relax”
“I tried it three times, and each time resulted in a terrible headache.”
“Very comfortable, tame high.  Tastes amazing and leaves you laying in a bed of leaves.  Was able to go about my business after medicating... slowly.”
“super relaxing, felt at ease with no anxiety for at least a good hour”

“Indica fans this is a MUST. Please believe that this strain kills pain and assists with sleep and anxiety. This is a rare strain and if you can get proper 22%+ then you should have the relief that Afgooey is famous for. I really enjoy it when it comes around it's a must try/stock for ailments.”
“Nice color, stinky, sticky, smokes long, effects last, and tastes great!”
“Good for a chill show like 4/3/98”

“The piney, vegetal fragrance is excellent and tastes the same; very pleasant. I don't find this to have the sedative effect others have described. In fact, this is my preferred daytime strain - I make my tincture from it. I have fibro and this produces a really strong body high that relieves pain but doesn't leave me feeling 'stoned' at all. As a mom who has to function through myriad everyday activities, this is pre...”
“Pickle pizza named after us. We win. Gooey good nomnomnom”
“Fire aff, had me laughing my ass off”
“Great stain for sleep. Has a nice flavor. Lots of crystals. Excellent weed indeed.”

“good strain, taste of 🌎&🌲
smooth, very high strain
dense lime green buds, covered in crystals
good choice of strain, i recomend trying this strain if u get the chane!✌💯🔥🌲”
“Great smell, smooth, great high, long lasting. What else can you ask for?”

“Tasty, relaxing, light - not heavy - headed, even bodied, steady high.
Very enjoyable. Smoked in morning but totally agree I could sleep like a baby if I didn't have to make pumpkin pie for Thanksgiving. 
No real munchies. Didn't zap my energy.  
Great for just chilling out I'd say.”
“works great for night time for me”
“Pure Indica Vibe strongly comparable to Willys Wonder...very Sweet..Strongly Recommend for Nighttime only or on your Days Off”
“Best strain yet! Great for anxiety. XO”
“smoked a bowl mad baked fire shit”

“Nice, pure indica with pretty, bright green, well trichomed buds.  Crystals are sticking more to my vial than my bowl...leading to a nice hit of kief at the end.  :)  Tastes a bit musty, though, despite the fact that it was purchased at a medical dispensary.  Most Afghanis do.  Very nice body high without total couchlock.  A great old-school strain.”
“A good high but would leave me pretty paranoid coming off of it. Makes you indeed gìggly and goofy.”

“my fellow service/retail employees; meet the answer to your end-of-day aches! At the time of writing this review, it is mere days to Xmas and my feet are two lumps of pain from working extra-long shifts. 

today has been the best day off in ages; feet are completely pain-free.
in small amounts you're just relaxed and all pains are dulled, but it didn't make me inarticulate or too sleepy.

larger amounts, (a whole joi...”

“Update 1/11/17
Good, but not for bed. At least not for me. It kills pain and relaxes the body but I feel a mental stimulation that keeps me from sleeping. Best for evenings when relaxing but not intending to sleep.

Also, it really is gooey. Whenever I smoke this strain, I have to clean the Pax immediately afterwards. Nice thing is I get little THC tar balls as a reward :-)”

“really 
iv started growing this 2 years back but it seem to be a light harvest and I do a lot of bubble hash and I liked the lemon skunk and with San Bernardino having max limits I went LS. as I don't smoke much unless is constreated other wise I eat my hash cap the kiff... and kick back because when it comes on its very relaxing and seem to last the nite even a uplifting sativa. but things change Linda (wife) want a...”

“Delicious strain for the late night cuddle intermission.

Definitely my right hand, that's my go to.”

“Very good at relieving stress and put me in a relaxed state at the second hit. It does give a bit of dry mouth but definitely worth it. Also improved my awearness and creativity as well as made me very happy. I definitely recommend this when the lights shut off.”
“This strain was exactly what I needed for my insomnia, after a dab or two I was melting into a full body relaxation which eased muscle tension and put me to sleep like a baby!”
“Great strains for relaxing. Strong body high but not to over the top where it feels uncomfortable. Would highly recommend!”
“This is a pretty good batch. High terps. Well trimmed. Could have gone a week longer. But that's just being picky.”
“its a good high it does make you sleepy and it doesn't last long”
“Got the dab, A++ Good holiday shopping strain....lol”

“The first thing you notice about this is the smell. The next thing you notice is the tricombs. It was intended for hash, after all. 

This has a very strong taste as well, but in the most pleasant way. Very relaxed tingly feeling. It was great for getting back to sleep. Highly recommended. Pun intended.”
“Lemon hits your palette and it's a slow creeper. Howevee, it makes you happy and giggle. Just a silly high that relieves pain. Especially abdominal pain.”

“this strain was an absolute lifesaver a few months ago! got a pretty serious injury (bruised tailbone, 15 stitches in hand and arm) that kept me out of work for about three weeks, and the painkillers they gave me left me still debilitated at half dose and puking at full. i'd never tried to use weed medicinally before. it chilled me out a bunch, which was helpful given how miserable the shock and subsequent stircrazie...”
“nice smooth taste,definitely a up high”

“Glorious strain. Picked up a 1/4 today based off what leafly has said about the effects from weeds in Victoria, BC. After a bong hit a wave of euphoria hits you in the head and goes throughout your entire body, followed by intense feelings of relaxations. This weed works as a good nighttime strain, I'm about to go to sleep after another bowl and am good and ready, even with bad insomnia generally. Playing videogames ...”
“one of my all time favorites.. fast hitting haze type buzz that leads to an all out coma a++++”
“A very fun strain. Keeps you happy and upbeat, but relaxed all at the same time.”
“helped me relax and feel sleepy”

“Love what is strain can do to calm the nerves, relax the body, mind and SLEEP!  It doesn't put my head into a tail spin like stronger Indicas.  For me it's just right.  Vaping gives off hints of pine and wood.  And at times it can get a bit harsh.  All good in my book.  Highly recommend.”
“Amazing, would recommend before bed, 😴💤 Very good to fall right asleep. Not a lot needed. I have had in flowers. Makes me hungry and falls right asleep. I have had this in flowers. 💚”

“color me not impressed. i suffer from chronic insomnia. this was recommended to me for insomnia. perhaps for a person with normal sleeping habits this will do the trick but if you have that crazy up all night"
column4: "i haven't slept in years" type of insomnia this ain't gonna cut it. i had really high (haha) hopes that this would be my night time one but the search continues... have heard great things about Black Domina ...”"

column3: “Although it did make me somewhat lazy, the overall body high was spectacular. Took care of my pain and the effect lasted a LONG time. I'd like to say it's the Cialis of weed.”
“This is the best remedy I have found for my insomnia yet. I have tried so many other strains and meds and this is the one that does the trick plus it's almost immediate which is fantastic!”
“High doesnt last too long. Does make u tired and relaxed but also I've had an energy kick from it too. Very stoney, lazy red eyes. Great for a day to do nothing but kick back relax n watch movies.”

“What can I say 
Real exquisiteness!”
“Good zone out bud!!”

“The gooey is aptly named, this stuff was so sticky that it went into the grinder with a gummy *squish*, and had trouble falling through the holes into the flower chamber.  Very pungent earthy aroma, not a very notable taste.  A pretty standard indica high but a good one.  No paranoia or anxiety or discomfort.”
“It's a great strain to relax on, if it's grown right and cured properly then you will have a calming and pain relieving high.”
“Popcorn nuggets. Fruity and delicious.”

“Great bud and a great, relaxed, high.  

I will stock up on this!”

“Had some outdoor grown Afgooey which looked questionable but after smoking it, I realize looks can be deceiving. This bud had me relaxed with out being couch-locked. I felt the stress melt away and had a happy, euphoric high. I'd recommend for people with anxiety and stress. Felt like I was on a porch swing with the sun on my face ☺️🌤”

“This indica hits hard and quick. Long high. Smells and tastes like Black Tea. Intense relaxation and even sleepiness, however, no couch lock.
Only drawback is the EXTREMELY dry mouth.”
“This strain was highly sedating, maybe more than ideal. It's good for before bed and did I sleep very soundly, but I would not smoke this unless dealing with insomnia.”
“Purchased in flower and oil form. Nice smooth taste with a good, mellow buzz. Nice anxiety reducer.”
“A very fun strain. Keeps you happy and upbeat, but relaxed all at the same time.”
“The taste and smell is awesome.  It leaves you feeling uplifted and relaxed.  Its a great night time strain.  Over all, just a really good indica. I would definitely get this strain again.”
“great taste,definitely a up high”

“Very heady high with a nice warm body high that creeps up on you. It's a little more heady then I'd like but it doesn't last to long than it melts into a lower head high. Which goes good with the body high.”
“I really enjoy this strain.  The aroma and the flavor have the grape/berry flavor that I like.  Very powerful as well.  Good stuff!”

“for some reason I seem to always try new buds with skepticism idk if its because when I was younger I used to buy from some pretty sketchy people, but when I smoked this amazingly sticky but not it a way that its super moist to where you can't even grind it but still nice and cripsy tacky sticky.  shit immediately had me feelin like the wind was blowing softer and felt absolutely amazing completely forgotten about al...”
“It's a good, happy, giggly high. Best at low doses. A really fun social high if everyone in the group has a little buzz. In higher doses I feel like it causes some irritability.”
“It is a good strain for the donation. Smokes good and tastes good. For a $10 donation it is worth the price.”
“large dense buds with a nice skunky smell. big body high. munchies and couchlock fursure.”
“I'd give it 4.25 stars. It's nice and potent, with a slight grape-y taste. It seems to work pretty well for stomach cramps and anxiety, with a slight lingering euphoric haze and giggly state.”
“Feel relaxed and lazy but great for pain.”
“Very nice for coming home after work and just unwinding...relaxing, smooth high”
“Great for sleep, decent taste definitely best for nightime”
“great relaxing happy high. good social smoke leaves you relaxed but wanting to giggle and converse at the same time. great for social anxiety.”
“Not super sting but a great relaxing vibe”
“Great for sleeping”
“Washington's Finest" strain: good even hybrid
“Very relaxing, awesome flavor. One of my favorite strains.”

“This strain is good for sleep, decent for pain. I built up a tolerance to it rather quickly, leading me to purchase a different indica to help manage my pain. Even if the pain relieving qualities diminished, it still helped my insomnia. Would recommend for everyone without a Snoop Dogg level tolerance, everyone else I know loves it.”
“A relaxing strain, not too strong for me. Helped me chill out after a long day at the LIFT convention with minimal cerebral effects, easygoing body stone. Will use again.”

“This strain makes me want to leave my first product review ever. I have widespread pain migraines anxiety insomnia and ADD. I take a lot of prescriptions and this doesn't interact with any of them, which for me is hard to find. Super relaxing and euphoric high but also makes me want to move, like exercise or clean or have sex. Love this strain.”
“I need something that makes my body chill out and makes me sleepy at night. This does the job.”
“very earthy but sweet taste. heavy indicia, good for a nap or bed time”
“First time on the gooey train and I love this Indica ride.”

“This strain is great if its grown properly and cured right! 
 
Decent strain to smoke before bed.”
“living in KY I don't have many options when it comes to strains. however when I got my hands on afgoo I was blown away.. hits smooth, slightly awkward taste, and pure relaxation.”

“Great for anxiety. Makes me hungry. Smells kinda sweet n bready, has a kinda bittersweet/earthy/spicey flavor. Been couch locked for like half an hour now, which is amazing cuz I've been edgy all day n super pacey  lolfuckshitpisspoop”
“cool”
“Tasty”
“Pretty good strain considering how long it lasted. Very relaxing, good for the evening while still being talkative.”
“Good for sleep and feeling paranoid.”
“Tasting hashy  spicy !! love it”
“Totally takes any pains away for a few really good hours, up to a full day. Very mellow and love taking walks after blasting some.Great piney aftertaste. Will not be let down.....too far :)”

“Not a wake 'n bake strain. Has a sweet pine-forest aroma that smells like fresh cut grass. Toked this at an Earth Wind and Fire concert and felt like I was one with the music. Green bud, orange sticky hairs. Fuzzy wuzzy muppet trichomes delicious!”

“Very nice buzz & long lasting high without a hangover".  Does bring out the munchies for me & doesn't do much for the pain. It also tends to make me fussy & accentuates my OCD. Not a creative high.”"

“This was my first time smoking weed.  This was a great strain to start with.  Very smooth, tasty and a really enjoyable high.  Only draw back was I was paranoid as hell (probably because it was my first time).  My gf was super relaxed more than I was.  Again great strain and would differently try it again.”

“smoked a j of it when I first got it from my delivery service.  That was a big mistake, it made me paranoid.  Barely could feel my body which makes me more paranoid, all I could feel was my heart racing.  This paranoid sensation lasted for over an hour despite trying to walk it out in my house and backyard and trying to focus on long easy breaths.  If it wasn't for the paranoia I would love it the body high.  Also ha...”

“i  acquired this strain  from a grower we will call proffesor afghani . the bag it came in had a tie which said organically grown  and i was very impressed out of the ten plus pounds i got of this stuff all the buds were some of the most beautiful i have ever seen  purples blues and reds  covered the buds  some of the buds were even blueish purple and very  very light green  very nice smoke  smooth fruity  and sticky...”
“Good mix in body head”
“about to try it”
